summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Connections Graph feature. All backend APIs working correctly (30 nodes, 435 edges). Frontend visualization, filtering, and navigation fully functional.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/connections/graph returns 30 nodes and 435 edges
Backend: POST /api/connections/graph with filters works (20 nodes, 180 edges)
Frontend: Graph visualization displays 30 nodes and 400+ edges
Frontend: Ranking sidebar shows top influencers with scores
Frontend: Navigation tabs (Influencers | Radar | Graph) work correctly
Frontend: Filters by Profile, Early Signal, Risk work (reduced to 5 nodes)
Frontend: Filter reset functionality restores full graph
Frontend: Legend displays correctly with color coding
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (15/15 tests passed), Frontend: 95% (11/12 features working)
